_comments.samples: Render quality samples: 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256 (higher = better quality, slower render)
_comments.resolution_scale: Resolution as percentage of base: 50, 75, or 100
_comments.threads_color: Thread color as hex code: '#RRGGBB' (e.g., '#FF0000' for red, '#000000' for black)
_comments.cameras: List of camera names to render. Empty list [] renders all cameras. Examples: ['Camera.001', 'Camera.002']
_comments.presets: List of [camera, frame] pairs for preset rendering. Examples: [['Camera.001', 180], ['Camera.002', 240]]
_comments.output_dir: Directory to save rendered images (relative to project root)
_comments.blend_file: Blender file name (should be in the project root directory)
